properties.name: The Statesman
properties.notes:
Luxury complex managed by Harbor Group. 

STRATEGY: 'Review Risk' Pitch. 
Found 4 specific resident complaints about inconsistent timing and weekend dumpster mess. 

NEXT MOVE: Walk-in Wednesday morning to deliver Spark Page link to Property Manager.

contacts.name: Property Manager
contacts.notes: Target for first Spark Page delivery.

properties.name: The Columns at Pilgrim Mill
properties.notes:
Luxury complex near Lake Lanier. Managed by ECI Management. 

STRATEGY: 'Maintenance Leakage' Pitch. 
Since public reviews are clean, focus on operational efficiency. Maintenance staff is likely losing 5-10 hours/week handling hallway trash and dumpster overflow. 

NEXT MOVE: Send Spark Page with focus on 'Recovered Maintenance Time'.

properties.name: Arbors at Lake Lanier
properties.notes:
Garden-style community near the lake. 

STRATEGY: 'Convenience & Curb Appeal' Pitch. 
Confirmed: NO TRASH CHUTES. Residents must walk bags to central dumpsters. This leads to bags sitting on balconies/breezeways. 

NEXT MOVE: Send Spark Page highlighting 'Resident Convenience' and 'Zero Balcony Trash'.
